Headline: Howard-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays at Linden. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays at Linden.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
